casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 28, 2009

[Cite as 0912812009 Case Announcements #2, 2009-Ohio-5084.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

1996-1956. State v. Reynolds.

Summit App. No. 16845. This cause came on for further consideration upon the motion for stay of execution scheduled for October 8, 2009. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that the state of Ohio shall file a response to the motion for stay no later than Thursday, October 1, 2009.
